en.title: FE Introduces Spokesman and Body Building Champion, Wong Hong, at Headquarters BEP, Wednesday, 23th July 2008.
en.content:
FE is proud to present FE Spokesman and QP Wearer, Champion  Body Builder Wong Hong, at FE HQ's Wednesday night BEP on 23th july 08. As usual, FE's office was packed with Leaders, Members and Invited Guests. Wong Hong did a great job sharing his testimonial with the crowd. Also sharing her testimonial on the night was Ms Law, FE Spokeswoman and Champion Power Lifter.

A BIG THANK YOU to Presidential Director, Bernard Foo who was speaker for the night,FE Member, Bobby Gan for being the MC and Presidential Directors KC Phoon and Rachel Thomas for attending and lending their support!

Note: As Spokesman for FE, Wong Hong is available to attend FE Leaders events. Interested Leaders can contact Patrick Chan at HQ to book Wong Hong for their events.

meta.description:

Also sharing her testimonial on the night was Ms Law, FE Spokeswoman and Champion Power Lifter.
A BIG THANK YOU to Presidential Director, Bernard Foo who was speaker for the night,FE Member, Bobby Gan for being the MC and Presidential Directors KC Phoon and Rachel Thomas for attending and lending their support!
Note: As Spokesman for FE, Wong Hong is available to attend FE Leaders events. Interested Leaders can contact Patrick Chan at HQ to book Wong Hong for their events.
meta.author: klhunter
